attributes.action: Allow Bognor Regis to become a stand alone district  council
attributes.additional_details:
Bognor Regis and  Littlehampton combined to form  Arun District Council as the Local Authority.  This was back when Bognor was a lot smaller in population.

We are fully aware that Bognor seems to lack the improvements which happen in Littlehampton.

How can decisions be made in Littlehampton when they do not necessarily know fully about our town's needs?

It would be good if the residents of Bognor were allowed to vote on this. If Bognor could break away from Arun District Council it would provide Bognor the opportunity to decide what happens with the income provided by large businesses within this area.
